name: clipgo
description: This is a chrome extension for running a selected golang code in The Go Playground.

scripts.go-wasm: GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm go build -o main.wasm src/background/go/main.go
scripts.build: webpack && yarn go-wasm && mv main.wasm build && cp src/manifest.json src/icons/*.png build

author: ramenjuniti <ramenjuniti@gmail.com> (https://github.com/ramenjuniti/)
